title: "New machine learning tool diagnoses electron beams in an efficient, non-invasive way"
excerpt: "Beams of accelerated electrons power electron microscopes, X-ray lasers, medical accelerators and other devices. To optimize the performance of these applications, operators must be able to analyze the quality of the beams and adjust them as needed."
